title: The Well Collector
description: "Time was speeding up, moving faster every day. He had to have another one. Now..."Love, lies, loss and murder. Not everything is what it seems in this short psychological thriller that takes readers on a journey through the darkest depths of one twisted soul. Everyone has that special collection - what does the Well Collector keep hidden away? And what happens when the collection is finally complete?
author: Trish Marie Dawson
